remarks: The subring algebra over a complete normed ring is a Banach space iff the subring is a closed division ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
srabn.a $e |- A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) $.
srabn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) $.
srabn $p |- ( ( W e. NrmRing /\ W e. CMetSp /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) ) -> ( A e. Ban <-> ( S e. ( Clsd ` J ) /\ ( W |`s S ) e. DivRing ) ) ) $.
